name: Solar Cram School/[太阳补习班]
description:
"Solar Cram School" is a simulated business game with the theme of business training courses. In this game, you are the principal of the school, while taking into account the important task of teaching, how to arrange teachers and classrooms reasonably will be a subject.

Simulated Operation

How to use the initial funds to publicize, enroll students, rent classrooms, step by step to expand the scale, the next King of Training is you!

Free Construction

In addition to renting classrooms, the game can also build several functional buildings to assist our growth, including the necessary teacher room to recruit teachers, the teaching materials room to enhance students'growth, as well as the parking lot to increase income, and so on. How to make good use of them needs your decision.

Competition Events

The game also includes activities such as math contest, Chinese contest, English contest, mid-term exam and final exam. You can gain prestige in these events and further enhance the teaching staff.

Free Scheduling

How to make good use of their teachers to arrange classes, so as to maximize the benefits, will be a very good topic, to know that sometimes automatic scheduling can not solve all the problems, or you need to personally manage!

Random Generated Students

According to the different qualities, students will be unlocked with the promotion of popularity, and students will have their own personality, which plays a decisive role in examinations and competitions. What kind of personality would it be? Looking forward to your discovery!
